input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item name information.

Item name:
CafePress - Con Abuela - Natural Canvas Tote Bag, Cloth Shopping Bag

Item specifications:
Professionally printed, thousands of designs to choose from.
Small measures 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles
Medium features full side & bottom support gussets, measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" reinforced fabric handle
Make this shopping tote your new favorite grocery bag, library tote, or beach tote. These bags are also great gifts for him or her, teachers or students, young or old, for any occasion.
Machine wash cold inside out with like colors and tumble dry low for easy and convenient care. IMPORTED.
We offer 100% money back guarantee, so you can buy with confidence. Your satisfaction is our promise, and returns/exchanges are made easy.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This stylish and practical tote bag is a must-have for any shopping enthusiast. Made from high-quality canvas in a natural beige color, it features a large and spacious interior that's perfect for carrying groceries, books, or personal items. The bag is also machine washable and features reinforced handles for added durability. The unique design is sure to turn heads and make you stand out from the crowd. With a 100% money-back guarantee, you can buy with confidence knowing that you'll love your new tote bag.
input_text.Response B: CafePress brings your passions to life with the perfect item for every occasion. With thousands of designs to choose from, you are certain to find the unique item you've been seeking. Travel in style with this cloth tote bag, professionally printed with your favorite design. These quality natural canvas hand bags are durable, professionally printed, and will satisfy all your reusable shopping bag needs. Also perfect as a beach tote, grocery bag, or book bag, these bags make great gifts for teachers or students, or treat yourself! And with CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges and a 100% money back guarantee. The bag measures 15"x15" with 26.5" sturdy reinforced fabric handles and is machine washable in cold water, with like colors and tumble dry low. The medium measures 15"x18"x6" with 22" a reinforced fabric handle.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
